title: Risk assessment and origin of metals in chicken meat and its organs from a commercial poultry farm in Akwa Ibom state, Nigeria
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Uwem Okon Edet, Akaninyene Joseph, Dokwo Bassey, Itoro Nyong Bassey, Glory P. Bebia, Elizabeth Mbim, Agbor Yeneochia Ogar
